text.0: let our strong hymn of praise go forth the laud of mitravaruṇa.
text.1: with homage to that highborn pair.
text.2: the two exceeding wise the sons of dakṣa whom the gods ordained.
text.4: such guardians of our homes and us o mitravaruṇa fulfil.
text.5: the thoughts of those who sing your praise.
text.6: so when the sun hath risen today may sinless mitra aryaman.
text.8: may this our home be guarded well forward ye bounteous on the way.
text.9: who bear us safely oer distress.
text.10: and those selfreigning aditi whose statute is inviolate.
text.11: the kings who rule a vast domain.
text.12: soon as the sun hath risen to you to mitravaruṇa i sing.
text.13: and aryarnan who slays the foe.
text.14: with wealth of gold may this my song bring unmolested power and might.
text.16: may we be thine god varuṇa and with our princes mitra thine.
text.17: food and heavens light will we obtain.
text.18: many are they who strengthen law suneyed with agni for their tongue.
text.19: they who direct the three great gatherings with their thoughts yea all things with surpassing might.
text.20: they who have stablished year and month and then the day night sacrifice and holy verse.
text.21: varuṇa mitra aryarnan the kings have won dominion which none else may gain.
text.22: so at the rising of the sun we think of you with hymns today.
text.23: even as varuṇa mitra aryaman deserve ye are the charioteers of law.
text.24: true to law born in law the strengtheners of law terrible haters of the false.
text.25: in their felicity which gives the best defence may we men and our princes dwell.
text.26: uprises on the slope of heaven that marvel that attracts die sight.
text.27: as swift celestial etaśa bears it away prepared for every eye to see.
text.28: lord of each single head of fixt and moving things equally through the whole expanse.
text.29: the seven sister bays bear sūrya on his car to bring us wealth and happiness.
text.30: a hundred autumns may we see that bright eye godordained arise.
text.31: a hundred autumns may we live.
text.32: infallible through your wisdom come hither resplendent varuṇa.
text.33: and mitra to the soma draught.
text.34: come as the laws of heaven ordain varuṇa mitra void of guile.
text.35: press near and drink the soma juice.
text.36: come mitra varuṇa accept heroes our sacrificial gift.
text.37: drink soma ye who strengthen law.
